Text: Re Greg Confidentially CSFB has the IPO Morgan Stanley is quietly handling some select acquisition inquiries I mentioned Enron and they didnt see why youd want to look so I offered to find out I think youd be impressed by the CEO You can email me or call me at Im traveling Monday but always reachable Happy Turkey Day Larry PM yes we might be interested can we talk next week

Greg Apollo is taking Pacer our transportation logistics company public through CSFB Were getting some interest in a sale as a result Given your expressed interest in the company do you want Enron to get a look Let me know Larry
